title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 454 - Snowmobile Trail Development And Maintenance
content:

State Regulations
§ 454.1 - Availability of state aid for snowmobile trail development and maintenance
§ 454.2 - Authorized expenditures
§ 454.3 - Local snowmobile trail development and maintenance plans
§ 454.4 - Application for state aid
§ 454.5 - Project agreement

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 454

Statutory authority: PRHPL, §§3.09[8], 27.17[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
